Company Description

Founded in 1997 by Thierry Gillier, Zadig&Voltaire redefines luxury for a new generation with a passion for freedom and creativity. The brand, influenced by music and contemporary art, embraces duality in its Parisian designs. The company encourages uniqueness, self-expression, and an independent mindset, fostering a youthful spirit.


Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a Sales Supervisor at Zadig&Voltaire in the Los Angeles Metropolitan Area. The Sales Supervisor will be responsible for managing the sales team, providing top-notch customer service, conducting training sessions, and ensuring effective communication with customers and team members.


Qualifications

  • Analytical Skills, Team Management, and Communication
  • Customer Service and Training abilities
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Proven track record of meeting sales targets and KPIs
  • Previous experience in retail or luxury fashion is a plus
